body:
DECLARE @SQL AS VARCHAR(255)
DECLARE @SPID AS SMALLINT
DECLARE getSession CURSOR FOR
SELECT spid FROM sys.sysprocesses WHERE loginame = 'PANO'
OPEN getSession
FETCH NEXT FROM getSession INTO @SPID
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 BEGIN
	    SET @SQL = 'Kill ' + CAST(@SPID AS VARCHAR(10)) + ';'
		EXEC (@SQL)
	
    FETCH NEXT FROM getSession INTO @SPID
END 
CLOSE getSession
DEALLOCATE getSession
